Present Working on product development and configuration at Comcast through SunTec Business Solutions Developed configured and deployed the SunTec legacy product Xelerate for billing and pricing transactions using Nifi Kafka and MongoDB Developed python script to migrate bulk data from Oracle to MongoDb Worked with operations team in developing bash script to create critical alarms on Nagios Python Developer Whale Technologies CA November 2017 to February 2018 Developed a software suit designed to analyze social media engagements and trends of target material Implemented real time sentiment analysis using Python Machine Learning algorithms and Flask framework Deployed the suit on GCP instance Designed a chat bot for twitter to analyze certain tweets and respond accordingly Software Developer The Casery Los Angeles CA June 2016 to December 2016 Integrated company invoicing system with shipping and inventory management platform to automate wholesale logistics process with August 2014 to February 2016 Quality Analysts Responsible for gathering requirements from key stakeholders like Product Managers Development and QA team documenting changes and writing functional Medical and Travel application Participated in bug review meetings with Automation testing team and prepared process flow documents Education MASTERS IN COMPUTER SCIENCE in Cloud Computing ILLINOIS
